verbose_text: Furthermore, in order to disrupt activin / ACVR2A signaling in primary mHSCs, cells were infected with Ad-ACVR2A shRNA or Ad-NC shRNA for 24 h, and were then stimulated with IL-17A or IL-17F for an additional 48 h.
evidence: disrupt activin/ACVR2A signaling in primary mHSCs, cells were infected with Ad-ACVR2A shRNA
